actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to reimburse certain employees of the Government Printing Office for uncompensated leave earned by such employees during fiscal year 1932.

summary.text: Directs the Public Printer to reimburse any officer or employee of the Government Printing Office who earned any leave during fiscal year 1932 which such person has not taken and for which such person was not compensated.

titles.title: A bill to reimburse certain employees of the Government Printing Office for uncompensated leave earned by such employees during fiscal year 1932.
